title: Gaming freezing for no reason
body: Hey guys, i got a new pc and everything seems to be fine with it, I mainly got it for league of legends but i play other games to. I tried my pc on csgo and it worked perfectly 0 game freezes 150 fps. But when i tried it in lol the game started freezing from the start. My resolution settings were 1920x1200 and all graphics set to the highest amount and i thought that was the problem for my freezing. But then  i tried it with lower resolution and all graphics settings to the lowest and it was the same thing. So please someone help me to enjoy this game :).

replies.body:
As a heads up, in case you are using a 4k monitor be aware that it may cause issues with League and you would need to reduce your resolution.  As a first time, it's super important to make sure all of your drivers are up to date when getting a new rig.  In addition to that, make sure you've gone through the wring of windows updates.  I suggest going through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well to tune up your pc.  

On a final note, if you have updated Windows already, then you may be having an issue with the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) that has been causing freezing for some players.  Disabling that can rid you of the freezing problem.

Hopefully, this will smooth things out for you!

Thanks for the help bud, For monitor i use my ex- tv screen its kinda big what resolution would you preffer for me to play on?
 Anyways thanks for the help! :)
